description: ACAN \\u2013 SOIL ANALYSIS - AGVISE LABORATORIESThis Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating to the supplier community that Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a service contract to a pre-identified supplier, thereby allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding, by submitting a Statement of Capabilities. If no supplier submits, a Statement of Capabilities that meets the requirements set out in the ACAN, on or before the closing date stated in this ACAN, the Contracting Officer may then proceed with the award to the pre-identified supplier.REQUIREMENTS:Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada will be contracting services from Agvise Laboratories Ltd for soil analysis services to fulfill AAFC project requirements. The projects use soil health indicators to compare cropping systems, to quantify utility of these indicators to crop yield prediction, and to contribute to a soil health index for Manitoba. The contractor will analyze 296 soil samples for Manitoba Pulse and Soybean Growers (MPSG) and Manitoba Corn Growers Association (MCGA) for:Haney soil health package, 24 hr CO2 respiration, Permanganate oxidizable carbon (POXC), ACE protein (bioavailable N|), Organic carbon, Soil organic matter, Nutrient analyses, pH, Electrical conductivity and TNThe Contractor will also analyze an additional 570 soil samples for Eastern Prairie Living Lab (Klassen farm) for:pH, EC, Nitrate, Olsen-P, Potassium, Calcium, Magnesium, Sodium, Sulfate, Organic matter and Particle sizeCRITERIA FOR ASSESSMENT OF THE STATEMENT OF CAPABILITIES :Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a statement of capabilities that it meets the following requirements:Are able to produce soil analysis duration_in_months: The Contract period is from date of contract award to March 31, 2023
full_summary:
# **Tender Title**: Soil Analysis
# **Tender Reference Number**: PW-23-01021387

**Publication Information**
* **Publication Date**: January 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 30, 2023, 2:00 pm CST

**Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
The government intends to award a service contract for soil analysis services to Agvise Laboratories Ltd for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s projects in Manitoba.

**Requirements**: 
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a service provider to analyze soil samples for various agricultural projects in Manitoba. The selected service provider will be required to conduct soil analyses for a total of 866 samples, including 296 samples for Manitoba Pulse and Soybean Growers (MPSG) and Manitoba Corn Growers Association (MCGA), and 570 samples for the Eastern Prairie Living Lab (Klassen farm).

**Evaluation Criteria**: 
To be eligible, service providers must demonstrate that they can produce soil analyses comparable to those produced by Agvise Laboratories Ltd for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

**Estimated Contract Value**: $74,402.55 CAD (including applicable taxes)
**Estimated Contract Period**: From the contract award date to March 31, 2023

**Sole Source Justification**: 
The proposed contract is a sole-source contract linked to a previous procurement. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada previously received soil analyses from Agvise Laboratories Ltd for its projects in Manitoba, and it is essential to use the same laboratory to ensure that data are comparable between years.

**Contact Information**: 
Camille Sobczak, Procurement Officer
Agriculture & Agri-Food Canada
Western Service Centre
400-303 Main Street
Winnipeg MB R3C 3G7
Phone: 204-430-5426
Email: camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca

**Statement of Capabilities**:
The government invites interested service providers to submit a Statement of Capabilities on or before January 30, 2023, at 2:00 pm CST. The Statement of Capabilities must clearly demonstrate that the service provider meets the requirements for the contract. The government retains the right to negotiate with service providers on any procurement.
